day. The sinusoidal function <math alttext="F open parentheses t close parentheses equals 8 cos open parentheses pi over 12 open parentheses t plus c close parentheses close parentheses plus 30"><semantics><mrow><mi>F</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mfenced><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>30</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> models the data, where <math alttext="F open parentheses t close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>F</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is the temperature, in <math alttext="degree F"><semantics><mrow><mo>°</mo><mtext>F</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, at time <math alttext="t"><semantics><mi>t</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, in hours past <math alttext="12"><semantics><mn>12</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> midnight, and <math alttext="c"><semantics><mi>c</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is a constant. Which of the following is true about the value of <math alttext="c"><semantics><mi>c</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​​The value of <math alttext="c"><semantics><mi>c</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is <math alttext="negative 2"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> because this accounts for a phase shift of <math alttext="g open parentheses t close parentheses equals 8 cos open parentheses pi over 12 t close parentheses plus 30"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>30</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> that aligns a minimum value of the data set with a minimum value of <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​​​The value of <math alttext="c"><semantics><mi>c</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is <math alttext="negative 2"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> because this accounts for a vertical shift of <math alttext="g open parentheses t close parentheses equals 8 cos open parentheses pi over 12 t close parentheses plus 30"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>30</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> that aligns a minimum value of the data set with a minimum value of <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​The value of <math alttext="c"><semantics><mi>c</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is <math alttext="negative 14"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>14</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> because this accounts for a phase shift of <math alttext="g open parentheses t close parentheses equals 8 cos open parentheses pi over 12 t close parentheses plus 30"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>30</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> that aligns a maximum value of the data set with a maximum value of <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​​The value of <math alttext="c"><semantics><mi>c</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is <math alttext="negative 14"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>14</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> because this accounts for a vertical shift of <math alttext="g open parentheses t close parentheses equals 8 cos open parentheses pi over 12 t close parentheses plus 30"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>30</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> that aligns a maximum value of the data set with a maximum value of <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

content.answer: ​The value of <math alttext="c"><semantics><mi>c</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is <math alttext="negative 14"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>14</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> because this accounts for a phase shift of <math alttext="g open parentheses t close parentheses equals 8 cos open parentheses pi over 12 t close parentheses plus 30"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>30</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> that aligns a maximum value of the data set with a maximum value of <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.
